org.mini2Dx.core.graphics

Class Graphics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.Graphics

  • public class Graphics
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements graphics rendering functionality

        y - The y coordinate the clip begins at
